ygData.subject: Re: You're all crazy!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Going at full speed, Zardus sees Punch jump out practically onto him. He stops suddenly, using several trees for breaks. Zardus transforms into his robot

::Zardus::

Going at full speed, Zardus sees Punch jump out practically onto him. He 
stops suddenly, using several trees for breaks.

Zardus transforms into his robot mode and looks at Punch and the rifle aimed 
at his own chest. "Yes...," he says, not crazy about the idea of being shot, 
"New recruits are allways welcome. I trust you have a name...."
